metadata.name: 2023 Consensus Pro Pass
metadata.description:
**Before purchasing, make sure the reward for this token has not already been claimed. You can redeem the reward here: https://consensus.tokenproof.xyz/**

This NFT is part of the CoinDesk rewards program. This reward was generated by [Microcosm #1](https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x2b3c48be4fb33b0724214aff12b086b0214f8f15/1).

This reward must be redeemed by 4/28/23
